textAfterTable: enum t_jgraphics_font_weight Enumeration of font weight options for font display. Enumerator: JGRAPHICS_FONT_WEIGHT_NORMAL  Normal font weight. JGRAPHICS_FONT_WEIGHT_BOLD  Bold font weight. Function Documentation long jbox_get_font_slant ( t_object *  b  )  Get the slant box's font. Parameters: b  An object's box.
